metadata.title: CVE-2021-40402 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the RS-274X aperture macro multiple outline primitives functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commit b5f1eacd), and Gerbv forked 2.7.1 and 2.8.0. A specially-crafted Gerber file can lead to information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

notes.note: iosifache> As per https://github.com/gerbv/gerbv/issues/80, the patching is still work in progress. There are multiple commits targeting this issue.

criterions.comment: gerbv package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-07').
